title: Natural & Holistic Medical Center - Mesa, AZ
description: Specialties: Natural Holistic Medical Center, Weight loss , Iv therapy, Ozone IVs, Vitamin Injections, semaglutide, PRP, Pain Control, Men's Health, Women's Health, Bio-identical Hormone therapy (BHRT) Pellets, Peptides, Supplements, Vitamins. and much more Call for your free consult Established in 2018. Naturopathic doctors offering a more natural holistic approach to healthcare. A healthy alternative to life. You can get healthy by balancing your hormones and correcting deficiencies in the body. Working with patients to achieve better quality of life through diet and exercise. We also offer IV Therapies, Vitamin Injections, BHRT, TRT, Men's and Women's health, Weight Loss, correcting type-2 diabetes. Also overcoming most illnesses (including chronic illness) naturally. We treat the cause not the symptoms.
